server_software.javadedicated.descriptio: Official server software from Mojang, suitable for someone needs pure vanilla features, likes datapack.
server_software.craftbukkit.description: CraftBukkit is a third-party plugin server software based on Vanilla, suitable for someone want to use plugin and don't want to modify the vanilla mechanics
server_software.spigot.description: Spigot is the performance-boosted version of CraftBukkit, ease to modify the vanilla mechanics, suitable for long-maintained game server.
server_software.paper.description: Paper based on Spigot, but more patches for deep optimization (likes multi-threading, faster algorithm, etc...), suitable for the server having large amount of players.
server_software.forge.description: Forge is a third-party mod server software based on Vanilla, it has ability to be installed mods that using Forge API to expanding game features.
server_software.neoforge.description: NeoForge is a forked version of Forge. Had all features that Forge has.
server_software.fabric.description: Fabric is a third-party mod server software different from Forge, it's lighter, faster, more frequently to update than Forge. It also has ability to be installed mods that using Fabric API to expanding game features.
server_software.quilt.description: Quilt is a forked version of Fabric. Had all features that Fabric has.
server_software.powernukkit.description: PowerNukkit is third-party server software, it has ability to be installed plugins.
scheduled_task.type.after_started: After the server is started for a while
scheduled_task.type.after_started.format: After the server is started for {0} {1}
After the server is started for  {0} {1}, every {2} {3}

The server still running, do you want to close WitherTorch?

scheduled_task_creating_wizard.page.basi: These information can help you identify this task and determine how the task triggered.
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.page.mess: Please input filtering expression of the main filter. To filtering capture texts, type the expressions you want in "Extra Filters" field!
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.page.exec: Choose the target of task, and complete the extra fields if it needed.
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.task_name: Please input the name of task
Task name is the filename of task, you can't type special characters like {0}
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.task_desc: Please input the description of task
You can type some words to describe this task, or leaves empty (WitherTorch will generate some description for the task)
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.task_main: Please input the filtering expression of main filter, in 'regular expression' format
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.task_extr: Please input the filtering expression of extra filters, with '<capture name>:<regular expression>' format (each line will be a new extra filter)
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.task_comm: Please input the commands of task (can insert special placeholders to replace the information at runtime)
scheduled_task_creating_wizard.after_sta: (Leave space or zero if you want a singleshot task)
